channel.title: [Re] How to make Npcs Shout
channel.description:
I remade because of course, as always, people give the most fucking stupidest answers in the world.
I need to know how to make Npcs Shout. I know that the file i go in is NpcHandler.java.. Yes, you don't have to tell me.
All i don't know is where to go. Help me out, give me a code and tell me where to add it perhaps?

item.title: [Re] How to make Npcs Shout
item.dc:creator: @Lallz Lallz
item.description:
@Lallz wrote:

ahhh lol shiit [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2009, 09:49:00 am[/size][hr]YES. Omfg i found out fuck… Finally…
for those who are having the same problem… here it is…

Since there isn’t any codes in Delta Base you must add them yourself right?

find Public Process… ( ty lester )

and add

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2356) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Chaos Elemental!"; } }

Read full topic

item.title: [Re] How to make Npcs Shout
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

i’ll go see if i can find one from the source that i have, gimme a sec ‘.’

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1063) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Welcome to X”;

I have that, and uhm

if (npcs[i].npcType == 3321) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “ADMINS+ DONT TELE IN HERE, YOU’LL BE GLITCHED”;
}

if that helps
}

Read full topic
